mapper.select: select Y.* from (select rownum rnum, X.* from (select B.*, F.renamed, U.nick, decode(goodbad, null, 0, goodbad) as goodbad from board B, (select * from files where type=1) F, users U, (select ref, sum(decode(good_bad, 1, 1, 0))-sum(decode(good_bad, 2, 1, 0)) as goodbad from recommend where type=1 group by ref) R where B.id = F.ref and B.id = U.id and B.no = R.ref(+) order by B.no desc) X) Y where Y.rnum between #{start} and #{end}
